message.body: Wanna grab a beer somewhere? We're on our way to your place
I just got into bed so I think I'll pass tonight.
Hope your session is going well.
We'll have to get a drink tomorrow

Morning ##### Just wanted to check in about our stay in the beautiful third floor suite, don't want to inconvenience you too much, but would it be ok if we stayed until Wed early am? I'd love to meet up this afternoon / evening to hang, we're free till Tues evening :)
Yeah that's cool. I'll be there during the day to work probably
Great! I'm at green line cafe across from Abyssinia doing some work, but would love to connect this afternoon; let me know when you're home & would entertain a break in work :)
I'm heading home now to work and will be working till dinner time
Want anything in particular for dinner ?
